title: Build a GitHub Repository Search
description: Create a service that searches GitHub repositories using their public API.
instructions:
Implement a GitHubService class that:
1. Creates a Dio instance configured for the GitHub API (https://api.github.com)
2. Implements searchRepositories(String query) that calls GET /search/repositories
3. Parses the response into a list of Repository objects
4. Handles errors properly, especially rate limiting (403 with rate limit message)
5. The Repository class should have: id, name, fullName, description, stargazersCount, language

hints.text: GitHub's search API returns results in an 'items' array. Access it with response.data['items'].
For rate limiting, check if statusCode is 403 and the response message contains 'rate limit'.
Remember to set the Accept header to 'application/vnd.github+json' for the GitHub API.
